{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++23|1=
constexpr auto begin() requires (!/*simple-view*/&lt;V&gt;);
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++23|1=
constexpr auto begin() const requires /*range-with-movable-references*/&lt;const V&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns an {{rlp|iterator}} to the first element of the {{tt|enumerate_view}}.

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|base_}} denote the underlying view.

@1@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return /*iterator*/&lt;false&gt;(ranges::begin(base_), 0);}}.
@2@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return /*iterator*/&lt;true&gt;(ranges::begin(base_), 0);}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
Iterator to the first element.
